character.title: Raul Menendez is an evil man who leads terrorists
character.name: Raul Menendez
character.description: Raul Menendez (Spanish: Raúl Menéndez) is a character introduced Call of Duty: Black Ops II serving as the main antagonist for both Black Ops II and Call of Duty: Strike Team. Menendez is a Nicaraguan drug lord and leader of the terrorist organization Cordis Die, who launched an attack of unprecedented scale against the United States of America in retaliation for the CIA's actions against his family in the decades before.
